typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.t_crossreference',
	format: 'query') ~> tcrossreference
source(output(
		ifaifaid as string,
		ifatxtkey as string,
		ifadedbrkperc as decimal(28,10),
		ifalimdays as decimal(28,10),
		ifadediem as string,
		ifadedbrktype as string,
		ifasw5 as string,
		ifaludate as date,
		ifadedsetting as string,
		ifaicaid as string,
		ifaln2 as short,
		ifadedmax as long,
		ifalusign as string,
		ifatext35 as string,
		ifadedbrk as string,
		ifanote as string,
		ifaamtcod as string,
		ifadedamt as long,
		ifaconndedcd3 as string,
		ifadedarea as short,
		ifalimcurr as string,
		ifalimamt as long,
		ifacostynsw as string,
		ifadays as decimal(28,10),
		ifadedcurr as string,
		ifatext70 as string,
		ifadedmin as long,
		ifahstid as string,
		ifainddays as decimal(28,10),
		ifadedcd3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.p_ifatable',
	format: 'query') ~> ifatable
source(output(
		from_currency_id as long,
		exchange_from_date as date,
		exchange_rate as decimal(28,10),
		exchange_to_date as date,
		from_currency_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select from_currency_id, exchange_from_date, exchange_rate, exchange_to_date, from_currency_code\nfrom dwh_stage.hlp_exchange_rate_to_usd',
	format: 'query') ~> HlpExchrateUSD
source(output(
		icaicaid as string,
		icainaid as string,
		icastat3 as string,
		icastdate as date,
		icaendate as date,
		icachdate as date,
		icatotamt as long,
		icaourshare as decimal(28,10),
		icapmlamt as long,
		icaeoamt as long,
		icaprovst as integer,
		icacadate as date,
		icaagaid as string,
		icaobno as integer,
		icapmlcurr as string,
		icaintrate as decimal(28,10),
		icaintosprem as decimal(28,10),
		icaintcurr as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select icaicaid, icainaid, icastat3, icastdate, icaendate, icachdate, icatotamt, icaourshare, icapmlamt, icaeoamt, icaprovst, icacadate, icaagaid, icaobno, icapmlcurr, icaintrate, icaintosprem, icaintcurr\nfrom dwh_stage.p_icatable',
	format: 'query') ~> ica
source(output(
		ipaicaid as string,
		iparate as decimal(28,10)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select ipaicaid, iparate\nfrom dwh_stage.p_ipatable\nwhere ipapcode in (\'O\',\'P\') and ipapremn3 = 3',
	format: 'query') ~> ipatable
source(output(
		iuvicaid as string,
		iuviuvid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select iuvicaid, iuviuvid\nfrom dwh_stage.p_iuvtable\nwhere iuvverstat = \'A\'',
	format: 'query') ~> iuv
source(output(
		iuwiuvid as string,
		iuwpartisip as long,
		iuwoutbusntyp as integer,
		iuwshare as decimal(28,10)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select iuwiuvid, iuwpartisip, iuwoutbusntyp, iuwshare\nfrom dwh_stage.p_iuwtable',
	format: 'query') ~> iuwtable
source(output(
		peapeaid as long,
		peaccode as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select peapeaid, peaccode\nfrom dwh_stage.p_peatable',
	format: 'query') ~> peatable
source(output(
		isaisaid as string,
		isaagaid as string,
		isasecnam as string,
		isalayertype as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select isaisaid, isaagaid, isasecnam, isalayertype\nfrom dwh_stage.p_isatable',
	format: 'query') ~> isatable
source(output(
		isziszid as string,
		isztotind as decimal(28,10),
		iszcshind as decimal(28,10)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select isziszid, isztotind, iszcshind\nfrom dwh_stage.p_isztable',
	format: 'query') ~> isztable
source(output(
		agaagaid as string,
		agabusndiv as integer,
		agabusnsec as integer,
		agabusncla as integer,
		agabusnregion as integer,
		agastdate as date,
		agastat2 as string,
		agabusnbranch as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select agaagaid, agabusndiv, agabusnsec, agabusncla, agabusnregion, agastdate, agastat2, agabusnbranch\nfrom dwh_stage.p_agatable',
	format: 'query') ~> agatable
source(output(
		inainaid as string,
		inaclmlead as long,
		inabusntyp as integer,
		inabusnsubcla as integer,
		inaintrst as string,
		inacurr as string,
		inacondco as short,
		inawarrenty as short,
		inareinynsw as string,
		inaisaid as string,
		inapiffotype as integer,
		inapirdctype as integer,
		inareinnoof as integer,
		inaretyp as integer,
		inareinshare as decimal(28,10),
		inamutual as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select inainaid, inaclmlead, inabusntyp, inabusnsubcla, inaintrst, inacurr, inacondco, inawarrenty, inareinynsw, inaisaid, inapiffotype, inapirdctype, inareinnoof, inaretyp, inareinshare, inamutual\nfrom dwh_stage.p_inatable',
	format: 'query') ~> inatable
source(output(
		obbobno as integer,
		obbstdate as date,
		obbendate as date,
		obbname as string,
		obbbuiltyear as short,
		obbvescod as string,
		obbcefoty as string,
		obbgrt as integer,
		obbdwt as integer,
		obbformt as integer,
		obbclass as string,
		obbsocity as string,
		obbvesisolan as string,
		obbnoofpax as integer,
		obbadr1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select obbobno, obbstdate, obbendate, obbname, obbbuiltyear, obbvescod, obbcefoty, obbgrt, obbdwt, obbformt, obbclass, obbsocity, obbvesisolan, obbnoofpax, obbadr1\nfrom dwh_stage.p_obbtable',
	format: 'query') ~> obbtable
source(output(
		obaobno as integer,
		obaimono as integer,
		obacallno as string,
		obaorgbui as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select obaobno, obaimono, obacallno, obaorgbui\nfrom dwh_stage.p_obatable',
	format: 'query') ~> obatable
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select fp_level_5_code, vsl_gard_group, fp_level_5_decode, fp_3_ltr_code, group_code\nfrom dwh_stage.sta_vessel_type_group',
	format: 'query') ~> StaVesselTypeGroup
source(output(
		pk_loh_scale as long,
		deductible_days as long,
		updated_by as string,
		indemnity_days_in_all as long,
		updated_date as date,
		inserted_date as date,
		indemnity_days as long,
		inserted_by as string,
		scale as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * \nfrom dwh_stage.sta_loh_scale',
	format: 'query') ~> staLohScale
tcrossreference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 136) ~> deductibleRule
deductibleRule select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['source_code_key','target_code'],name)),
			$$+'_deductibleRule' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefDeductibleRule
ica select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['icaicaid','icastdate','icaourshare','icaeoamt'],name)),
			$$+'_dedRule' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> icatableDedRule
icatableDedRule derive(icastdate_exchange = case(icastdate_dedRule > currentDate(), currentDate(), icastdate_dedRule)) ~> DeriveIcastdateExchange
JoinIfaxCrossDeductible, HlpExchrateUSD join(icastdate_exchange == EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE_dedRule
	&& coalesce(ifadedcurr,'USD') == FROM_CURRENCY_CODE_dedRule,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIcaExcharate
DeriveIcastdateExchange, ifatable join(icaicaid_dedRule == ifaicaid,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIcaIfa
JoinIcaIfa, xrefDeductibleRule join(ifadedcd3 == source_code_key_deductibleRule,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIfaxCrossDeductible
JoinIcaExcharate derive(rob_ded_amount_pa_org = case((in(['A','E','F','SRI'], target_code_deductibleRule)),ifadedamt,toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_amount_pa_curr = case((in(['A','E','F','SRI'], target_code_deductibleRule)),ifadedcurr,null()+''),
		rob_ded_amount_pa_usd = case((in(['A','E','F','SRI'], target_code_deductibleRule)),coalesce(ifadedamt/EXCHANGE_RATE_dedRule, 0),toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_amount_amd_org = case((in(['B','T'], target_code_deductibleRule)),ifadedamt,toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_amount_amd_curr = case((in(['B','T'], target_code_deductibleRule)),ifadedcurr,null()+''),
		rob_ded_amount_amd_usd = case((in(['B','T'], target_code_deductibleRule)),coalesce(ifadedamt/EXCHANGE_RATE_dedRule,0), toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_org = case((in(['C'], target_code_deductibleRule)),ifadedamt, toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_curr = case((in(['C'], target_code_deductibleRule)),trim(ifadedcurr),null()+''),
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_usd = case((in(['C'], target_code_deductibleRule)),coalesce(ifadedamt/EXCHANGE_RATE_dedRule, 0),toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_amount_ice_org = case((in(['D'], target_code_deductibleRule)),ifadedamt,toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_amount_ice_curr = case((in(['D'], target_code_deductibleRule)),trim(ifadedcurr),null()+''),
		rob_ded_amount_ice_usd = case((in(['D'], target_code_deductibleRule)),coalesce(ifadedamt/EXCHANGE_RATE_dedRule, 0),toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_days_indemnity = case((in(['503','203'], ifadedcd3)),ifadays,toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_days_in_all = case((in(['204'], ifadedcd3)),ifadays,toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_days = case((in(['202','401','208'], ifadedcd3)),ifadays,toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_days_machinery = case((in(['205'], ifadedcd3)),ifadays,toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_layer = case(ifadedcd3 =='202','MAIN',
    case(ifadedcd3 =='208', 'XS', 
        case(ifadedcd3 =='207', 'VARY', 'N/A'))),
		rob_ded_daily_indemnity = case((in(['201','206','909','207','209'], ifadedcd3)),ifadedamt,toDecimal(0)),
		rob_ded_daily_indemnity_curr = case((in(['201','206','909','207','209'], ifadedcd3)),ifadedcurr,null()+''),
		rob_ded_daily_indemnity_usd = case((in(['201','206','909','207','209'], ifadedcd3)),coalesce(ifadedamt/EXCHANGE_RATE_dedRule,0),toDecimal(0)),
		excess_of_amt_org = case(coalesce(icaeoamt_dedRule,0)>0, icaeoamt_dedRule*icaourshare_dedRule/100, toDecimal(0)),
		excess_of_amt_usd = case(coalesce(icaeoamt_dedRule,0)>0, (icaeoamt_dedRule*icaourshare_dedRule/100)/EXCHANGE_RATE_dedRule, toDecimal(0))) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns aggregate(groupBy(icaicaid_dedRule),
	each(match(startsWith(name,'rob')&&endsWith(name,'usd')), $$ = sum($$)),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'rob')&&endsWith(name,'curr')), $$ = max($$)),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'rob')&&endsWith(name,'org')), $$ = sum($$)),
		rob_ded_days_indemnity = sum(rob_ded_days_indemnity),
		rob_ded_days = sum(rob_ded_days),
		rob_ded_days_in_all = sum(rob_ded_days_in_all),
		rob_ded_days_machinery = sum(rob_ded_days_machinery),
		rob_ded_daily_indemnity = sum(rob_ded_daily_indemnity),
		rob_ded_layer = max(rob_ded_layer),
		excess_of_amt_org = max(excess_of_amt_org),
		excess_of_amt_usd = max(excess_of_amt_usd)) ~> Aggregate
tcrossreference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 122) ~> coverage
coverage select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['source_code_key','target_code'],name)),
			$$+'_coverage' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefCoverage
Aggregate derive(rob_ded_amount_pa_usd = excess_of_amt_usd + rob_ded_amount_pa_usd,
		rob_ded_amount_pa_org = excess_of_amt_org + rob_ded_amount_pa_org,
		rob_ded_amount_amd_org = case(coalesce(rob_ded_amount_amd_org,0)==0, 0, toInteger(rob_ded_amount_amd_org)),
		rob_ded_amount_amd_usd = case(coalesce(rob_ded_amount_amd_usd,0)==0, 0, toInteger(rob_ded_amount_amd_usd)),
		rob_ded_amount_amd_curr = case(isNull(trim(rob_ded_amount_amd_curr)), null()+0, toInteger(rob_ded_amount_amd_curr)),
		rob_ded_days_machinery = case(coalesce(rob_ded_days_machinery, 0)==0, rob_ded_days, rob_ded_days_machinery)) ~> DeriveRobDedAmountColumns
ica select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['icaicaid','icaourshare'],name)),
			$$+'_lineInfo' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> icatableLineInfo
iuv, icatableLineInfo join(iuvicaid == icaicaid_lineInfo,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> iuvica
iuvica, iuwtable join(iuviuvid == iuwiuvid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> iuviuw
iuviuw, peatable join(iuwpartisip == peapeaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> iuwpea
iuwpea derive(own_share = case(peaccode == 91, coalesce(iuwshare, 0), toDecimal(0)),
		cut_share = case(peaccode == 92, coalesce(iuwshare, 0), toDecimal(0)),
		co_share = case(!in([91,92], peaccode),
    case(iuwoutbusntyp ==2, coalesce(iuwshare,0), toDecimal(0)),toDecimal(0)),
		re_share = case(!in([91,92], peaccode),
    case(iuwoutbusntyp == 3, coalesce(iuwshare, 0), toDecimal(0)),toDecimal(0))) ~> DeriveShareColumns
DeriveShareColumns aggregate(groupBy(icaicaid_lineInfo),
	icaourshare_lineInfo = max(icaourshare_lineInfo),
		ret_share = sum(own_share),
		cut_share = sum(cut_share),
		co_share = sum(co_share),
		re_share = sum(re_share)) ~> AggregateLineInfo
AggregateLineInfo derive(rob_re_line = coalesce(re_share*icaourshare_lineInfo/100, 0),
		rob_ret_line = coalesce(ret_share*icaourshare_lineInfo/100, 0),
		rob_co_line = coalesce(co_share*icaourshare_lineInfo/100, 0),
		rob_cut_line = coalesce(cut_share*icaourshare_lineInfo/100, 0)) ~> DeriveRobLineColumns
tcrossreference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 113) ~> agreementType
agreementType select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['source_code_key','target_code','target_description'],name)),
			$$+'_agreementType' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefAgreementType
tcrossreference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 106) ~> businessArea
businessArea select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['source_code_key','target_code'],name)),
			$$+'_businessArea' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefBusinessArea
tcrossreference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 124) ~> currency
currency select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['source_code_key','target_code'],name)),
			$$+'_currency' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefCurrency
tcrossreference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 45) ~> vesselSubType
vesselSubType select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['source_code_key','target_code','target_description'],name)),
			$$+'_vesselSubType' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefVesselSubType
ica derive(icastdate_exchange = case(icastdate > currentTimestamp(), currentTimestamp(), icastdate)) ~> DerivedIcaStdateExchange
StaVesselTypeGroup select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in(['fp_level_5_code','vsl_gard_group','fp_level_5_decode','fp_3_ltr_code','group_code'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> vesselTypeGroup
DeriveRobLineColumns select(mapColumn(
		icaicaid_lineInfo,
		rob_re_line,
		rob_ret_line,
		rob_co_line,
		rob_cut_line
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LineInfo
DeriveRobDedAmountColumns select(mapColumn(
		icaicaid_dedRule,
		rob_ded_amount_pa_usd,
		rob_ded_amount_amd_usd,
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_usd,
		rob_ded_amount_ice_usd,
		rob_ded_daily_indemnity_usd,
		rob_ded_amount_pa_curr,
		rob_ded_amount_amd_curr,
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_curr,
		rob_ded_amount_ice_curr,
		rob_ded_daily_indemnity_curr,
		rob_ded_amount_pa_org,
		rob_ded_amount_amd_org,
		rob_ded_amount_rdc_org,
		rob_ded_amount_ice_org,
		rob_ded_days_indemnity,
		rob_ded_days,
		rob_ded_days_in_all,
		rob_ded_days_machinery,
		rob_ded_daily_indemnity,
		rob_ded_layer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DedRule
DerivedIcaStdateExchange, DedRule join(icaicaid == icaicaid_dedRule,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIcaDedRule
JoinIcaDedRule, obatable join(icaobno == obaobno,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIcaOba
JoinIcaOba, obbtable join(obaobno == obbobno,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinObaObb
JoinObaObb, xrefVesselSubType join(trim(upper(obbcefoty)) == trim(upper(source_code_key_vesselSubType)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinObbXrefVesselSubType
JoinObbXrefVesselSubType, vesselTypeGroup join(target_code_vesselSubType == fp_3_ltr_code,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinxRefVesselSubTypeVesselType
JoinxRefVesselSubTypeVesselType, inatable join(icainaid == inainaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIcaIna
JoinIcaIna, agatable join(icaagaid == agaagaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIcaAga
JoinIcaAga, xrefCurrency join(case(inaintrst == '80', coalesce(icapmlcurr, 'USD'), inacurr) == source_code_key_currency,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInaXrefCurr
JoinInaXrefCurr, HlpExchrateUSD join(target_code_currency == FROM_CURRENCY_CODE,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinxrefCurrExchrateUSD
JoinxrefCurrExchrateUSD, LineInfo join(icaicaid == icaicaid_lineInfo,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIcaLineInfo
JoinIcaLineInfo, xrefBusinessArea join(case(substring(toString(agabusndiv), 1, 1) =='4', toString(agabusndiv)+' - '+inamutual, toString(agabusndiv)) == source_code_key_businessArea,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAgaxRefBusinessArea
JoinAgaxRefBusinessArea, xrefAgreementType join(toString(agabusncla) == source_code_key_agreementType,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAgaXrefAgreementType
JoinAgaXrefAgreementType, xrefCoverage join(inaintrst == source_code_key_coverage,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInaXrefCoverage
JoinInaXrefCoverage, isatable join(agaagaid == isaagaid
	&& inaisaid == isaisaid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAgaIsa
JoinAgaIsa, isztable join(isaisaid == isziszid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIsaIsz
JoinIsaIsz, ipatable join(icaicaid == ipaicaid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInaIpa
JoinInaIpa filter(((icaendate >= coalesce(obbstdate, addDays(currentTimestamp(),-365000))) && (icaendate <= coalesce(obbstdate, addDays(currentTimestamp(),365000)))) &&
icastdate_exchange == EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE) ~> FilterDates
FilterDates, staLohScale lookup(lpad(toString(rob_ded_days_indemnity), 10, '0') + lpad(toString(rob_ded_days_in_all), 10, '0') + lpad(toString(rob_ded_days), 10, '0') == lpad(toString(indemnity_days), 10, '0') + lpad(toString(indemnity_days_in_all), 10, '0') + lpad(toString(deductible_days), 10, '0'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupStaLohScale
LookupStaLohScale derive(last_updated_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_RISK_OBJECT_ME') ~> DeriveLastUpdated
HlpExchrateUSD select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			$$+'_dedRule' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> exchrateusdDedRule
HlpExchrateUSD select(mapColumn(
		from_currency_id,
		exchange_from_date,
		exchange_rate,
		exchange_to_date,
		from_currency_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> exchrateusd
DeriveLastUpdated sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
